title: Undisputed
description: Monroe Hutchens is the heavyweight champion of Sweetwater, a maximum security prison. He was convicted to a life sentence due to a passionate crime. Iceman Chambers is the heavyweight champion, who lost his title due to a rape conviction to ten years in Sweetwater. WHen these two giants collide in the same prison, they fight against each other disputing who is the real champion.

reviews.text: Just the build-up hype for last fight!Music and soundtrack was amazing,acting was good Wesley snipes was good.love the art work in cell,mike Tyson felt little off but the Ripstein character he was MVP amazing his love for sports he's honesty at end and his dialogues specially the F#ing speech was awesome.story and screenplay was okay.they have too many side characters which were okay,starting it felt entertaining and ending was awesome with fight but the middle act was literally boring it was just set-up to fight and drama about the prison and its characters which felt slow and boring but ending was good!Overall it was one time watch!
